scenes.imagePrompt: Traditional Indian illustration style. A warm, bustling royal kitchen (Rasoi). Copper pots, milk boiling, and a head chef (Halwai) looking focused amidst steam and spices. Nostalgic lighting.
Traditional Indian illustration. Close-up shot of a skilled Halwai rolling smooth, small balls of khoya dough. The background shows a large, traditional iron kadhai filled with golden, bubbling ghee.

Traditional Indian illustration. Artistic depiction of deep red-orange saffron syrup (chaashni) being poured over the freshly fried khoya balls. Steam rising, emphasizing the sweet, floral aroma of rose water.
Traditional Indian illustration. A beautiful, artistic plate of dark, syrupy Gulab Jamuns resting in a silver bowl. The texture looks incredibly soft and soaked. Warm, cinematic lighting.

Traditional Indian illustration. A nostalgic scene of a royal family or village elders happily sharing Gulab Jamun during a festive gathering. Focus on the joy and tradition of the sweet. Soft, golden light.
